snippet.title: Gem Deeps GamePlay
snippet.description:
Gem Deeps Game and the gameplay is here, its is an action-adventure platforming RPG with skill-based combat, type of game with hand-painted art, and a deep story.

Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1479830/Gem_Deeps/

While chasing a stolen magic crystal, you are stumbling upon an ancient underworld civilization and scripts of even older origin.

Both of those sources, the underworld mythos, and ancient tablets, are offering ​different versions of the long-forgotten Genesis story

TITLE: Gem Deeps
GENRE: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG
DEVELOPER: Gemboi
PUBLISHER: Gemboi
RELEASE DATE: 21 Dec, 2020

#GemDeeps
